modBayonetDescription: Melee Weapon, deals 4 DC Physical Piercing 1 damage
modMarksmanStockDescription: Gains Two-Handed, loses Inaccurate, gains Precision
modRecoilCompensatingStockDescription: Gains Two-Handed, loses Inaccurate, +1 Fire Rate
modFinnedBarrelDescription: +1 damage DC, increases Range by 1 grade
modPortedBarrelDescription: Increases Range by 1 grade, +1 Fire Rate
modVentedBarrelDescription: Increases Range by 1 grade, +1 Fire Rate, gains Reliable
modAutomaticDescription: -1 damage DC, +2 Fire Rate, gains Burst, gains Inaccurate
modReceiver45Description: Damage becomes 4 DC, +1 Fire Rate, Ammo becomes .45
modReceiver50Description: Damage becomes 8 DC, gains Vicious, Ammo becomes .50
modAutomaticPistonReceiverDescription: +2 Fire Rate, reduces Range by 1 grade
modLongNightVisionScopeDescription: Gains Precision, gains Night Vision, increases Range by 1
modReflexSightDescription: Can reroll the Hit Location die
modBeamSplitterDescription: -1 damage DC, gains Spread, -1 Fire Rate, gains Inaccurate, reduces Range by 1 grade
modFullStockEnergyDescription: Gains Two-Handed, gains Piercing 1, loses Close Quarters
modMarksmanStockEnergyDescription: Gains Two-Handed, loses Inaccurate, gains Precision, loses Close Quarters
modRecoilCompensatingStockEnergyDescript: Gains Two-Handed, loses Inaccurate, +1 Fire Rate, loses Close Quarters
modStandardStockDescription: Gains Two-Handed, loses Inaccurate, loses Close Quarters
modAutomaticBarrelDescription: -1 damage DC, loses Close Quarters, increases Range by 1 grade, +1 Fire Rate
modSniperBarrelDescription: +2 damage DC, loses Close Quarters, increases Range by 1 grade, -1 Fire Rate
modFlamerBarrelDescription: -2 damage DC, +2 Fire Rate, gains Burst, reduces Range by 1 grade, gains Inaccurate
modLongBarrelEnergyDescription: Loses Close Quarters, increases Range by 1 grade
modLongReinforcedBarrelDescription: Loses Close Quarters, increases Range by 1 grade, allows muzzle mod
modSplitterDescription: -1 damage DC, gains Spread, gains Inaccurate
modThreeChargeCapacitorDescription: +1 damage DC, consumes 3 ammo per shot
modFourChargeCapacitorDescription: +2 damage DC, consumes 4 ammo per shot
modFiveChargeCapacitorDescription: +3 damage DC, consumes 5 ammo per shot
modSixChargeCapacitorDescription: +4 damage DC, consumes 6 ammo per shot
modLongScopeEnergyDescription: Gains Precision, increases Range by 1 grade
modLongNightVisionScopeEnergyDescription: Gains Precision, gains Night Vision, increases Range by 1 grade
modReflexSightEnergyDescription: Can reroll the Hit Location die
modElectricSignalAntennaDescription: Damage becomes 7 DC Energy, gains Radioactive
modAutomaticSignalRepeaterDescription: +2 Fire Rate, gains Burst, loses Blast
modDeepDishDescription: +1 damage DC, increases Range by 1 grade
modReflexSightGatlingDescription: Can reroll the Hit Location die
modElectrificationModuleDescription: Damage type becomes Energy, gains Radioactive
modCompressionNozzleDescription: +1 damage DC, increases Range by 1 grade
modVaporizerNozzleDescription: +2 damage DC, increases Range by 1 grade, -1 Fire Rate
modBayonetMissileLauncherDescription: Melee Weapon, deals 4 DC Physical Piercing 1 damage
modShredderDescription: Melee Weapon, deals 6 DC Physical Piercing 2 damage
modElectrifiedBatonDescription: +1 damage DC, damage type becomes Energy, gains Radioactive
modElectrifiedSwordDescription: +1 damage DC, damage type becomes Energy, gains Radioactive
modElectrifiedSerratedSwordDescription: +2 damage DC, damage type becomes Energy, gains Radioactive, gains Persistent
modPneumaticDescription: Stun damage requires 2+ Effects to affect character
modAsbestosLiningDescription: +3 Energy Resistance, Ignores Persistent Energy damage
modStreamlinedDescription: Can spend up to 4 AP for bonus melee damage
modBalancedDescription: Melee and unarmed attacks gain Piercing 1
modStabilizedDescription: When aiming and making a Ranged Attack, damage increases by +1 DC
modMuffledDescription: Can reroll one d20 on Sneak checks
effectShadowedDescription: Shadowed Armor: 1+ pieces = ignore first complication on Sneak in darkness; 3+ pieces (Torso=2) = reroll 1d20 on Sneak in darkness 1/scene; 5+ pieces (Torso=2) = reroll 1d20 on every Sneak check in darkness. Does not work with Power Armor.
effectStealthRerollDescription: Can reroll one d20 on Sneak checks
effectAimDamageBonusDescription: When aiming and making a Ranged Attack, damage increases by +1 DC
effectMeleeBonusAPDescription: Can spend up to 4 AP for bonus melee damage
effectStunResistanceDescription: Stun damage requires 2+ Effects to affect character
effectSpecialRerollDescription: Reroll one d20 per scene on a skill check based on the specified SPECIAL attribute
effectCarryWeightDescription: Increases the maximum carry weight by the specified amount
effectIgnoreLightPenaltyDescription: Ignore any difficulty increase due to excessive light
effectGasMaskDescription: +3 to Poison Damage Resistance against any airborne or gaseous poison; Wearer suffers no effects from gas or dust; +1 to difficulty of all Speech checks
qualityCripplingDescription: The difficulty of any test to heal injuries caused by a Crippling weapon is increased by 1.
qualityMeleeDescription: Can be used as a melee weapon, inflicting 4 DC Physical Piercing damage
qualityMrHandyOnlyDescription: This weapon is integrated into a Mr Handy robot's body and can only be used by Mr Handy units. It cannot be equipped by other character types.

notEnoughLuckAlert: You don't have enough LUCK to do it!

modRobotPlatingStandardDescription: Standard factory plating that all new Mister Handy models come with.
modRobotPlatingMisterGutsyDescription: Mister Gutsy base plating with better thermal absorption capabilities, more resistant against Energy weapons.
modRobotFactoryArmorOpticsDescription: Mass-produced armor that provides additional storage compartments for optics.
modRobotFactoryArmorBodyDescription: Mass-produced armor that provides additional storage compartments for the main body.
modRobotFactoryArmorArmsDescription: Mass-produced armor that provides additional storage compartments for arms.
modRobotFactoryArmorThrustersDescription: Mass-produced armor that provides additional storage compartments for thrusters.
modRobotFactoryStorageBodyDescription: Factory armor with additional storage compartments to increase carrying capacity.
modRobotBasePlatingOpticsDescription: Supplemental handcrafted armor for optics that provides protection from physical hazards.
modRobotBasePlatingBodyDescription: Supplemental handcrafted armor for the body that provides protection from physical hazards.
modRobotBasePlatingArmsDescription: Supplemental handcrafted armor for arms that provides protection from physical hazards.
modRobotBasePlatingThrustersDescription: Supplemental handcrafted armor for thrusters that provides protection from physical hazards.
modRobotKnurledPlatingOpticsDescription: Coating with jagged and serrated edges for optics. Sharp points can injure attackers.
modRobotKnurledPlatingBodyDescription: Coating with jagged and serrated edges for the body. Sharp points can injure attackers.
modRobotKnurledPlatingArmsDescription: Coating with jagged and serrated edges for arms. Sharp points can injure attackers.
modRobotKnurledPlatingThrustersDescripti: Coating with jagged and serrated edges for thrusters. Sharp points can injure attackers.
modRobotPoisonousPlatingOpticsDescriptio: Handcrafted armor coated with dangerous toxic materials for optics.
modRobotPoisonousPlatingBodyDescription: Handcrafted armor coated with dangerous toxic materials for the body.
modRobotPoisonousPlatingArmsDescription: Handcrafted armor coated with dangerous toxic materials for arms.
modRobotPoisonousPlatingThrustersDescrip: Handcrafted armor coated with dangerous toxic materials for thrusters.
modRobotToxicPlatingOpticsDescription: Armor with dangerous radioactive metal coating for optics.
modRobotToxicPlatingBodyDescription: Armor with dangerous radioactive metal coating for the body.
modRobotToxicPlatingArmsDescription: Armor with dangerous radioactive metal coating for arms.
modRobotToxicPlatingThrustersDescription: Armor with dangerous radioactive metal coating for thrusters.
modRobotActivationFrameOpticsDescription: Armor equipped with actuators and motor systems for optics.
modRobotActivationFrameBodyDescription: Armor equipped with actuators and motor systems for the body.
modRobotActivationFrameArmsDescription: Armor equipped with actuators and motor systems for arms. Melee attacks deal +1 DC damage.
modRobotActivationFrameThrustersDescript: Armor equipped with actuators and motor systems for thrusters. Allows both a minor Movement action and a major Sprint action in the same turn.
modRobotVoltaicFrameOpticsDescription: Armor equipped with additional conductors and capacitors for optics.
modRobotVoltaicFrameBodyDescription: Armor equipped with additional conductors and capacitors for the body.
modRobotVoltaicFrameArmsDescription: Armor equipped with additional conductors and capacitors for arms.
modRobotVoltaicFrameThrustersDescription: Armor equipped with additional conductors and capacitors for thrusters.
modRobotHydraulicFrameOpticsDescription: Armor concealing a powerful hydraulic system for optics.
modRobotHydraulicFrameBodyDescription: Armor concealing a powerful hydraulic system for the body.
modRobotHydraulicFrameArmsDescription: Armor concealing a powerful hydraulic system for arms. Melee attacks deal +1 DC damage and gain the Stun effect.
modRobotHydraulicFrameThrustersDescripti: Armor concealing a powerful hydraulic system for thrusters.
effectKnurledDescription: When a melee attack is made against this part and the attacker suffers a complication, they also suffer 2 DC Persistent (Physical) damage. Melee attacks with knurled arms gain the Persistent (Physical) damage effect.
effectPoisonousDescription: When a melee attack is made against this part and the attacker suffers a complication, they suffer 2 DC Persistent (Poison) damage. Melee attacks with poisonous arms gain the Persistent (Poison) damage effect.
effectToxicDescription: When a melee attack is made against this part and the attacker suffers a complication, they suffer 2 DC Radiation damage. Melee attacks with toxic arms gain the Radioactive damage effect.
effectActivationArmsDescription: Melee attacks made with these arms deal +1 DC damage.
effectActivationThrustersDescription: Can perform both a minor Movement action and a major Sprint action in the same turn.
effectVoltaicDescription: All attacks that deal Energy damage deal +1 DC. The bonus increases by +1 DC for every two additional parts with Voltaic Frame (+2 DC with 3 pieces or +3 DC with 5 pieces or more).
effectHydraulicDescription: Melee attacks made with these arms deal +1 DC damage and gain the Stun damage effect.
